name: BIG BRAIN KEMIST
description:
This is a 2d platformer game where the player is trying to fix the consequences of his terribly failed experiment. 

He's fighting with his past self, going back in time, trying his best to save the world from an absolute catastrophe, caused by his Big brain.

The player has to make sure he's choosing the right path because he then needs to pass it again, this time though, it will be full of ghosts of his past, trying to kill him. He will find himself in a situation where every next move needs to be calculated beforehand.
